mapper.select: select * from (select @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum, a.* from (select a.*,c.c_name,s.sf_name,t.tr_name from advice_t a,course_t c,staff_t s, trainee_t t WHERE status = 0 and a.c_idx= c.c_idx and a.tr_idx=t.tr_idx and s.sf_idx = c.sf_idx)a ,(select @RN:=0) b) c where c.rnum between ${begin} and ${end} ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advice_t(so_idx, ss_day, tr_idx, ss_menu, ss_pp, subject, ss_pd, c_idx, status ) values(#{so_idx}, #{ss_day}, #{tr_idx}, #{ss_menu}, #{ss_pp}, #{subject}, #{ss_pd}, #{c_idx}, 0)
